mapper.insert: insert into book (title, writer, writedate, province, city, startdate, description, img) values(#{title}, #{writer}, now(), #{province}, #{city}, #{startdate}, #{description}, #{img, jdbcType=BLOB})
mapper.select: select bookno, title, writer, writedate, province, city, startdate, description, score, img from book where bookno = #{bookno}
select bookno, title, writer, writedate, province, city, startdate, description, score, img from book where writer = #{nickname} order by writedate
